scripts.build: npm run build-alt; npm run build-alt-runtime; npm run build-alt-browser; npm run build-alt-browser-with-addons
scripts.build-alt-browser: NODE_ENV=production browserify src/alt.js -t babelify --outfile dist/alt-browser.js --standalone Alt
scripts.build-alt-browser-with-addons: NODE_ENV=production browserify src/alt-with-addons.js -t babelify --outfile dist/alt-browser-with-addons.js --standalone Alt
scripts.coverage: istanbul cover _mocha -- -u exports -R list --compilers js:babel/register --require babel/external-helpers test
scripts.test: npm run build; npm run tests-all
scripts.tests-all: mocha -u exports -R list --compilers js:babel/register --require babel/external-helpers test
